head.b:skin: /* ----------------------------------------------- Blogger Template Style Name: Charm Responsive Blogger Template Designer: Ceyron Louis URL: http://www.oddthemes.com Version: 1.0 ----------------------------------------------- */ <Variable name="maincolor" description="Main Color" type="color" default="#FDD835" value="#fdd835"/>

div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

p.small: 住所をタップするとGoogle Mapが別窓で開きます。

a.onclick: javascript:window.open( this.href, " " , " menubar = no, toolbar = no, resizable = yes, scrollbars = yes, height = 600, width = 600 " ); return false;
a.title: Share this on Google+

a.span: You are viewing Most Recent Post
